lines.text: You don't want a cause. You want revenge!
Oh, excuse me, I didn't introduce myself. Sims, Preacher Sims, Servant of the Lord.
A preacher, huh? With wanted posters?
Well, not ordained exactly, but close to it... sort of called to the cloth.
Well, I sort of mix vocations - a shepherd of the flock... a hunter of men
He's still alive, but his guts look mighty sick!
The point of your revenge has passed. Now it's lust... lust for killing!
So help me God, I'll kill 'em! I'll kill every last one of 'em!
Vengeance is mine sayeth the Lord! He will seek out your enemies and smite them down.
Then the Lord will have to get there before I do.
May the Lord ride with you, Brother Cain. Because if He isn't, you'll ride alone.
